name: Overload (itch) (TheGamingGuma)
description:
This is Overload, a VR informational game about one of the many symptoms of Autism and some of the effects that occur with a person that has Autism. In this game I will be mainly focusing on "Sensory Overload" which is when people get too much information at once. This includes all senses but mainly sound. In this game, I plan on making it uncomfortable but educational as well.

Also this Itch.io game page will be updated regularly.

Contributers: https://lazyfridaystudio.itch.io
